title.narrative: Strengthening the voices of youth in the G5 Sahel countries, engagement

description.narrative: The Voices of Youth in Sahel

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

title.narrative: Cooperation policies take the needs of youth organisations into account through the regional dialogue gathering national authorities, the G5 Sahel, the European Union and its member States

description.narrative: 1 G5 Sahel Integrated Youth Strategy, along with a plan of action, are adopted

title.narrative: Cooperation policies take the needs of youth organisations into account through the regional dialogue gathering national authorities, the G5 Sahel, the European Union and its member States

description.narrative: 1 G5 Sahel Integrated Youth Strategy, along with a plan of action, are adopted

comment.narrative: 1 framework for the development of a youth strategy of the G5 Sahel (Cadre de référence pour la stratégie integrée jeunesse du G5 Sahel).

title.narrative: Youth organizations have managed to be included in local decision-making processes

description.narrative: Dialogue between local authorities and youth organization is sustainable across the 25 regions of intervention

title.narrative: Youth organizations have managed to be included in local decision-making processes

description.narrative: Dialogue between local authorities and youth organization is sustainable across the 25 regions of intervention

comment.narrative: 5 local frameworks of dialogue per country of intervention, gathering both youth organisation representatives and authorities, have been put in place but are not yet sustainable.

title.narrative: Youth organizations have managed to be included in national decision-making processes

description.narrative: National dialogue frameworks, gathering both authorities and youth organisations representatives, allow the negotiation of consensus measures to prevent and manage social tensions involving youth

title.narrative: Youth organizations have managed to be included in national decision-making processes

description.narrative: National dialogue frameworks, gathering both authorities and youth organisations representatives, allow the negotiation of consensus measures to prevent and manage social tensions involving youth

comment.narrative: 1 national framework of dialogue per country of intervention, gathering both youth organisation representatives and authorities, has been put in place but are not yet sustainable.

title.narrative: Youth organizations have been able to participate in decision-making processes at the local, national and regional levels

description.narrative: Political and socio‐economic decision‐making processes at local, national and regional levels include youth organizations

title.narrative: Youth organizations have been able to participate in decision-making processes at the local, national and regional levels

description.narrative: Political and socio‐economic decision‐making processes at local, national and regional levels include youth organizations

comment.narrative:
1 national and 5 local frameworks of dialogue per country of intervention, gathering youth organisation representatives and authorities, have been put in place but are not yet sustainable.
1 regional framework of dialogue is existing at regional level.
